description:
ABOUT: This course will not only expose you to some of the real dangers of both the Internet and mobile phones, but it will also show you how to keep yourself and your family safer online.

MATERIALS: The course makes use of a series of captivating videos to expose you to the risks of the online world.

LENGTH: The entire course is about 1h45 but each video is only approx. 10 minutes

STRUCTURE: The course is built around the key danger areas of the Internet. The following are the topics covered:

  • Understanding the Net Generation
  • The lurking danger of Chat Rooms
  • The deadly threat of Sexting
  • Cyber-bullying
  • Facebook - Everyone's here!
  • YouTube - The hidden danger
  • Google - The Good and the Bad
  • The Teenage Brain
  • So you think you can't be scammed?

WHY DO THIS COURSE? Well, if you think your family is important, then this is vital! There is only one way to keep them safe, and that is installing Brain Security!
title: Social Media Safety
